eventSummary:
Coinbase experienced a major data breach, resulting in a $307 million hit to its Q2 earnings. The breach involved cybercriminals bribing offshore customer service staff to access user data, with initial total losses estimated up to $400 million. This incident also led to a decline in spot trading volumes and revenue.
Sources:
- https://t.me/leviathan_news

A U.S. cybercrime group is actively targeting banks and credit unions.
Sources:
- https://www.americanbanker.com/news/a-u-s-cybercrime-group-is-targeting-banks-and-credit-unions

Crypto exchanges CoinDCX and BigONE collectively lost $71 million due to infrastructure-level failures, highlighting vulnerabilities even when employing multi-party computation (MPC). Experts warn that assuming internal systems are secure can lead to significant breaches.
Sources:
- https://twitter.com/1237544865216507906/status/1950511690602221872
